snippet: KESSLER--Emanuel, dearest husband of Muriel for 66 years, devoted father of Eve and Steven, adored Grandpa of James, Jacob, Rachel, Michael and Alison, died at home peacefully on March 25, at 96. Graduate of F&M and Cornell Law. Distinguished Counselor at Law, student of Shakespeare, avid gardener, skilled canoeist and swimmer. Lt. Colonel in the Army JAGs in WWII. Funeral at Hellman Memorial Chapel, Spring Valley, on March 27, 10:45 am. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KESSLER--Emanuel, dearest husband of Muriel for 66 years, devoted father of Eve and Steven, adored Grandpa of James, Jacob, Rachel, Michael and Alison, died at home peacefully on March 25, at 96. Graduate of F&M and Cornell Law. Distinguished Counselor at Law, student of Shakespeare, avid gardener, skilled canoeist and swimmer. Lt. Colonel in the Army JAGs in WWII. Funeral at Hellman Memorial Chapel, Spring Valley, on March 27, 10:45 am. 1/3
